name: Vista Cay

reviews.text: We have just returned from the Vista Cay having spent six nights March 11 - March 17 2008. We were a bit apprehensive having stayed at the Sheraton Vistana a couple of years ago and experienced some problems with our room at check in.
reviews.title: Excellent vacation

reviews.text: We arrived an hour and a half before check in and were told our room was ready, check in time was a total of 7 minutes. When we walked into our 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo we were very impressed. It was very modern and spotless, the kitchen had brand new stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. The large living area had leather couches with a large screen t.v. which was very comfortable after a day at the parks. Each bedroom was a good size, the master having it's own huge ensuite and a walk-in-closet and the separate dining area was a bonus for family meals. We were on the third floor and overlooked the lake. We have two teenagers and they were happy that they had internet access and playstation in the room.
reviews.title: Great Stay at Vista Cay

likes.disliked: — No jetted tub. But the garden tub was nice.

reviews.text: We spent some time at the pool and found it very relaxing and enjoyable and the kids used some of the amenities that were available.
reviews.title: Nice fresh condo's, handy location

likes.disliked: — Perhaps too many condos in one development

reviews.text: They are building a grocery store next door, which will be very convenient when it opens.
reviews.title: 3 Bedroom Townhouse was a beauty

reviews.text: We stayed in a three bedroom executive suite which was very nice. Beautiful new stainless steel kitchen. Very spacious living area and even your own balcony. The only complaints: the beds are not very comfortable, the pool and hot tub are kind of nasty, the hallways smell like garbage on Sunday because there is no trash pick-up that day. But if I were going to Orlando again I would definitely stay here. You get much more for your money than at a hotel and the condos are really very nice. Also check-in was a breeze...very nice people.
reviews.title: Great deal

reviews.text: This is a great option for families visiting the Orlando area. The accommodations are very spacious and new. We rented a 3 bedroom 2 bath condo. The finishes were high end, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances. It's 5 minutes from Universal or Sea World and about 15 minutes from the Disney parks. I asked for a quiet unit away from any construction noise and I had a great experience. There is a clubhouse with a large pool and numerous other amenities. There's also a large shopping center right next to the development which will be completed in the next few months. That will make this development even more attractive with the addition of a Publix to make your shopping easy.
reviews.title: Great choice for families

reviews.text: These apartments and grounds are quite nice, however, there is too much noise from people above, traffic on the stairs, people coming and going in the parking lot at all hours and outside landscaping activities. There is no quiet pool, so you can listen to the same kids screeching all day that are making a racket above you half of the night. I feel sorry for the people that own these apartments as they are not very well built or maintained.
reviews.title: Vista Cay is a noisey, dense, apartment complex

reviews.text: This was an amazing place to stay. 3 bedroom condo with 2 full baths. Roomy, roomy, roomy!!!! Huge walk in closet. Wonderful kitchen. The clubhouse was really nice with pool tables and computer room and gym. You felt like you were away from all the hubbub but it was actually just around the corner. Easy access to I-4 to get to Disney parks and very close to Universal and SeaWorld. We will definitely return to Vista Cay.
reviews.title: Luxury condo

reviews.text: Beware! Noisy student/young adult renters 'til wee hours!
reviews.title: BEWARE! Noisy Partying Neighbors could ruin your sleep!

likes.disliked: — Neighbors partying every night making it impossible to sleep.

reviews.text: Great condo in the Orlando area for what you'd spend on a hotel! Very spacious, very well appointed condo (ours was a 3 bedroom), located on a lake property. Development also has a clubhouse for guest use with a nice outdoor pool, game room, fitness center and movie room.
reviews.title: Loved the Vista Cay

likes.liked: — Spaciousness and quality of the accomodations
likes.disliked: — Need to drive to all commercial establishments

reviews.text: I'd recommend to all going to the Orlando area!
reviews.title: IT's OK, but...

likes.disliked: — Left out in the cold when nobody answers the emergency line.

reviews.text: One item to note though is that you will need a car if you stay here, as there are no commercial establishments within walking distance.
reviews.title: what a great find!

reviews.text: This is a nice development that was literally "thrown" together. It all looks good unless you look closely. Probably the cheapest, shoddiest construction I have ever seen. The builder should be fired and prevented from building anything else - ever.
reviews.title: Fantastic for business trip to Orlando...Bringing Family back in April

reviews.text: We attended a conference at the Orange County Convention Center. The location of this place is AWESOME. You can walk to the convention center, Universal Studios is less than 10 minutes away, and Disney is only about 15. It is located very close to the International Drive district.
reviews.title: Can't wait to return!!!!

aka: Vista Cay Resort By Millenium Hotel
description: Lake front luxury Condominium resort located in the heart of the attractions and entertainment district on International Drive and Universal Blvd. Featuring beautifully appointed 2 & 3 Bedroom / 2 bath condo-suites and 3 bedroom 3.5 bath Town Homes. Located only 3 miles from Universal Studios, 1 mile from Sea World and 0.25 from the Orange County Convention Center.
